data.title: Explore the Florida Keys by Visiting Bloodline Filming Locations
data.meta_description: Have you seen Netflix’s hit series Bloodline? If so, you know that it is set in the gorgeous Florida Keys—a stunning archipelago stretching from Key Largo to Key West. data.meta_site_name: Islamorada Island Adventures Boat Charters - Florida Keys Trips and Tours
data.text:
Have you seen Netflix’s hit series Bloodline? If so, you know that it is set in the gorgeous Florida Keys—a stunning archipelago stretching from Key Largo to Key West. This beautiful scenery serves as the backdrop for the show’s suspenseful drama. And for those of us who are fans of Bloodline, visiting the show’s filming locations has become a popular tourist activity. Here’s what you need to know about exploring the Florida Keys through Bloodline.

The Filming Locations

There are several popular Florida Keys filming locations from Bloodline that have become fan favorites. These include Anne’s Beach, Coral Bay Marina, Pierre’s Restaurant and the Moorings Islamorada, Hurricane Monument in Key Largo, and many more! If you want to get an up-close look at these iconic filming spots, there are a few ways to do so. The most obvious way is to plan a vacation around them. But if you don’t have time for that, or if you live nearby and just want a day trip, there are plenty of guided tours available too!

Another great way to explore these sites is with a self-guided tour. You can pick up a copy of the “Bloodline Tour Guide: A Self-Guided Tour of Popular Filming Locations in the Florida Keys” book at any local bookstore or on Amazon. It contains detailed maps and descriptions of all the major filming locations around town, as well as some bonus trivia about the show itself!

What Else Can I Do While I’m There?

Of course, there’s much more to do in the Florida Keys than just visiting Bloodline filming locations! There’s fishing and diving (both off shore and deep sea), kayaking and snorkeling trips around Key West National Wildlife Refuge, parasailing over crystal clear waters and some amazing music festivals like Mile 0 Fest! You can even charter your own private boat for an unforgettable day out on the water! And when it comes time to refuel after all that fun, there are countless seafood restaurants serving up fresh catches right off the pier!

If you’re planning a trip down south to explore all that Florida has to offer—especially if you’re a fan of Bloodline—it’s worth checking out some of its famous filming locations in the Florida Keys. Whether it’s taking part in one of many guided tours or exploring on your own with a map and guidebook, make sure not to miss out on this exciting opportunity! With its stunning scenery and endless activities both on land and at sea, visiting these sites will no doubt be one of your fondest memories. So grab your flip flops and head down south—the adventure awaits!
